title: 89/89/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 January 1989 approving a specific programme for the processing and marketing of olives and oil seeds notified by the Greek Government pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 13 January 1989
approving a specific programme for the processing and marketing of olives and oil seeds notified by the Greek Government pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the Greek text is authentic)
(89/89/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The programme for the olive and oil seed sector submitted by the Greek Government on 24 May 1988 is hereby approved.
2. Such approval does not extend to investments concerned with olive pomace oil, or any investments which would result in a net increase in capacity for olive-oil production or refining, or for crushing oil seeds or refining vegetable oil.
This Decision is addressed to the Hellenic Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 January 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 167, 26. 6. 1987, p. 1.
